text: Boggo Road railway station is a railway station currently under construction as part of the Cross River Rail project in the Brisbane suburb of Dutton Park. To be built as an underground station, it will comprise of two platforms with connections to Park Road station and Boggo Road busway station.Boggo Road Station Cross River Rail Construction commenced in September 2019, with it scheduled to open in 2024.Brisbane Cross River contractors selected Railway Gazette International 12 April 2019Boggo Road station site establishment Cross River Rail September 2019 ==References== Category:Dutton Park, Queensland Category:Proposed railway stations in Australia Category:Railway stations located underground in Australia Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2024
title: Boggo Road railway station
